verses.verse: And the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,
Speak<WH1696> unto the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and say<WH559> unto them<WH935>, When you be come into the land<WH776> of your habitations<WH4186>, which I give unto you<WH5414>,

And will make<WH6213> an offering by fire<WH801> unto the Lord<WH3068>, a burnt offering<WH5930>, or a sacrifice<WH2077> in performing<WH6381> a vow<WH5088>, or in a freewill offering<WH5071>, or in your solemn feasts<WH4150>, to make<WH6213> a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> unto the Lord<WH3068>, of the herd<WH1241>, or of the flock<WH6629>:

Then shall he that offereth<WH7126> his offering<WH7133> unto the Lord<WH3068> bring<WH7126> a food offering<WH4503> of a tenth deal<WH6241> of flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with the fourth<WH7243> part of an hin<WH1969> of oil<WH8081>.
And the fourth<WH7243> part of an hin<WH1969> of wine<WH3196> for a drink offering<WH5262> shall you prepare<WH6213> with the burnt offering<WH5930> or sacrifice<WH2077>, for one<WH259> lamb<WH3532>.

Or for a ram<WH352>, you shall prepare<WH6213> for a food offering<WH4503> two<WH8147> tenth deals<WH6241> of flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with the third<WH7992> part of an hin<WH1969> of oil<WH8081>.
And for a drink offering<WH5262> you shall offer<WH7126> the third<WH7992> part of an hin<WH1969> of wine<WH3196>, for a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> unto the Lord<WH3068>.
And when you preparest<WH6213> a bullock<WH1121> for a burnt offering<WH5930>, or for a sacrifice<WH2077> in performing<WH6381> a vow<WH5088>, or peace offerings<WH8002> unto the Lord<WH3068>:
Then shall he bring<WH7126> with a bullock<WH1241> a food offering<WH4503> of three<WH7969> tenth deals<WH6241> of flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with half<WH2677> an hin<WH1969> of oil<WH8081>.
And you shall bring<WH7126> for a drink offering<WH5262> half<WH2677> an hin<WH1969> of wine<WH3196>, for an offering made by fire<WH801>, of a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> unto the Lord<WH3068>.
Thus shall it be done<WH6213> for one<WH259> bullock<WH7794>, or for one<WH259> ram<WH352>, or for a lamb<WH3532>, or a kid<WH5795>.
According to the number<WH4557> that you shall prepare<WH6213>, so<WH3602> shall you do<WH6213> to every one<WH259> according to their number<WH4557>.
All that are born of the country<WH249> shall do<WH6213> these things after this manner<WH7126>, in offering an offering made by fire<WH801>, of a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> unto the Lord<WH3068>.

And if a stranger<WH1616> sojourn<WH1481> with you<WH8432>, or whoever be among you in your generations<WH1755>, and will offer<WH6213> an offering made by fire<WH801>, of a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> unto the Lord<WH3068>; as you do<WH6213>, so he shall do<WH6213>.

One<WH259> ordinance<WH2708> shall be both for you of the congregation<WH6951>, and also for the stranger<WH1616> that stays<WH1481> with you<WH2708>, an ordinance for ever<WH5769> in your generations<WH1755>: as you are<WH1616>, so shall the stranger be before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068>.
One<WH259> law<WH8451> and one<WH259> manner<WH4941> shall be for you<WH1616>, and for the stranger that stays with you<WH1481>.
And the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,
Speak<WH1696> unto the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and say<WH559> unto them<WH935>, When you come into the land<WH776> where I bring you<WH935>,
Then it shall be<WH398>, that, when you eat of the bread<WH3899> of the land<WH776>, you shall offer up<WH7311> an heave offering<WH8641> unto the Lord<WH3068>.

You shall offer up<WH7311> a cake<WH2471> of the first<WH7225> of your dough<WH6182> for an heave offering<WH8641>: as you do the heave offering<WH8641> of the threshingfloor<WH1637>, so shall you heave it<WH7311>.
Of the first<WH7225> of your dough<WH6182> you shall give<WH5414> unto the Lord<WH3068> an heave offering<WH8641> in your generations<WH1755>.
And if you have erred<WH7686>, and not observed<WH6213> all these commandments<WH4687>, which the Lord<WH3068> has spoken<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>,

Even all that the Lord<WH3068> has commanded<WH6680> you by the hand<WH3027> of Moses<WH4872>, from the day<WH3117> that the Lord<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH1973>, and from now on among your generations<WH1755>;

Then it shall be<WH6213>, if anything be committed by ignorance<WH7684> outside the knowledge<WH5869> of the congregation<WH5712>, that all the congregation<WH5712> shall offer<WH6213> one<WH259> young<WH1121> bullock<WH6499> for a burnt offering<WH5930>, for a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> unto the Lord<WH3068>, with his food offering<WH4503>, and his drink offering<WH5262>, according to the manner<WH4941>, and one<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin offering<WH2403>.

And the priest<WH3548> shall make an atonement<WH3722> for all the congregation<WH5712> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and it shall be forgiven<WH5545> them<WH7684>; for it is ignorance: and they shall bring<WH935> their offering<WH7133>, a sacrifice made by fire<WH801> unto the Lord<WH3068>, and their sin offering<WH2403> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068>, for their ignorance<WH7684>:

And it shall be forgiven<WH5545> all the congregation<WH5712> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and the stranger<WH1616> that stays<WH1481> among<WH8432> them<WH5971>; seeing all the people were in ignorance<WH7684>.
And if any<WH259> soul<WH5315> sin<WH2398> through ignorance<WH7684>, then he shall bring<WH7126> a she goat<WH5795> of the first<WH1323> year<WH8141> for a sin offering<WH2403>.

And the priest<WH3548> shall make an atonement<WH3722> for the soul<WH5315> that sins ignorantly<WH7683>, when he sins<WH2398> by ignorance<WH7684> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068>, to make an atonement<WH3722> for him<WH5545>; and it shall be forgiven him.

You shall have one<WH259> law<WH8451> for him that sins<WH6213> through ignorance<WH7684>, both for him that is born<WH249> among the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and for the stranger<WH1616> that stays<WH1481> among them<WH8432>.

But the soul<WH5315> that does<WH6213> anything presumptuously<WH7311>, whether he be born in the land<WH249>, or a stranger<WH4480>, the same blasphemes<WH1442> the Lord<WH3068>; and that soul<WH5315> shall be cut off<WH3772> from among<WH7130> his people<WH5971>.

Because he has despised<WH959> the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068>, and has broken<WH6565> his commandment<WH4687>, that soul<WH5315> shall utterly<WH3772> be cut off<WH3772>; his iniquity shall be upon him<WH5771>.
And while the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> were in the wilderness<WH4057>, they found<WH4672> a man<WH376> that gathered<WH7197> sticks<WH6086> upon the sabbath<WH7676> day<WH3117>.
And they that found<WH4672> him gathering<WH7197> sticks<WH6086> brought<WH7126> him unto Moses<WH4872> and Aaron<WH175>, and unto all the congregation<WH5712>.
And they put<WH3240> him in custody<WH4929>, because it was not declared<WH6567> what should be done to him<WH6213>.

And the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, The man<WH376> shall be surely<WH4191> put to death<WH4191>: all the congregation<WH5712> shall stone<WH7275> him with stones<WH68> outside<WH2351> the camp<WH4264>.

And all the congregation<WH5712> brought<WH3318> him outside<WH2351> the camp<WH4264>, and stoned<WH7275> him with stones<WH68>, and he died<WH4191>; as the Lord<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses<WH4872>.
And the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Speak<WH1696> unto the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and bid<WH559> them that they make<WH6213> them fringes<WH6734> in the borders<WH3671> of their garments<WH899> throughout their generations<WH1755>, and that they put<WH5414> upon the fringe<WH6734> of the borders<WH3671> a cord<WH6616> of blue<WH8504>:

And it shall be unto you for a fringe<WH6734>, that you may look<WH7200> upon it<WH2142>, and remember all the commandments<WH4687> of the Lord<WH3068>, and do<WH6213> them<WH8446>; and that you seek not after<WH310> your own heart<WH3824> and your own eyes<WH5869>, after<WH310> which you use to go a whoring<WH2181>:
That you may remember<WH2142>, and do<WH6213> all my commandments<WH4687>, and be<WH1961> holy<WH6918> unto your God<WH430>.
I am the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, which brought you out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, to be your God<WH430>: I am the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>.
